original_title: Stevie Ray Vaughan : Live from Austin Texas
overview: Live from Austin, Texas is a live video by Stevie Ray Vaughan and Double Trouble. It is a retrospective of the band's two performances on Austin City Limits in 1983 and 1989. The film was released as a DVD on September 3, 1997.
title: Stevie Ray Vaughan : Live from Austin Texas
